title: Survey: Multi-Modal Reasoning with LLMs (2024)
abstract: A comprehensive survey of multi-modal reasoning methods, benchmarks, and open challenges. Covers vision-language models, chain-of-thought, and retrieval-augmented reasoning.

title: Active Evaluation of Vision-Language Models
abstract: Proposes when and how to ask for human feedback when evaluating VLMs to reduce cost while maintaining reliability.

title: Python venv and dependency management â€“ quick tips
abstract: How we use venv and requirements.txt in the lab for reproducible experiments. Includes tips for GPU/CUDA environments.

title: Debugging out-of-memory errors in Transformer training
abstract: Common causes of OOM and practical fixes: gradient checkpointing, mixed precision, and batch size tuning.

title: Rumors and timeline: What we know about GPT-5
abstract: Summary of credible rumors and expected capabilities. No official release date yet.

title: EU AI Act: Latest updates and impact on research
abstract: Brief overview of the EU AI Act and what it means for academic and industry research in high-risk AI systems.

title: Tutorial: Fine-tuning an open LLM on your own data
abstract: Step-by-step guide using Hugging Face and LoRA to fine-tune LLaMA or Mistral on a custom dataset.

title: Patent landscape: NLP and dialogue systems (2024)
abstract: Review of key patents filed in 2024 related to natural language processing and dialogue systems. Useful for prior art and trend analysis.
